author: By Andrew Desiderio and Nahal Toosi
title: Republicans whack China over coronavirus as Trump plays nice
description: The president has embraced a less combative approach.
content: Its like a bad movie. Its like the sinister person goes out and causes a problem and then only they can solve the problem but its going to cost you money, Sen. Rick Scott (R-Fla.), who has proposed aggressive measures to punish China, said in an interview. Th… [+5220 chars]
